errors.failedToRecover: Failed to recover data. Please try again.

howDoesItWork.question: How does this work?
howDoesItWork.answer: Song credits unlock songs. Once unlocked, you can karaoke to the lyrics to learn English, read the translations, and practice exercises where your errors will be graded by AI. Once unlocked, you always have access to the song.

whatAreSongCredits.question: What are song credits?
whatAreSongCredits.answer: Song credits give you access to the song's lyrics, its translations, and the ability to do karaoke.

whatAreVoiceCredits.question: What are voice credits?
whatAreVoiceCredits.answer: Voice credits are used for karaoke and language learning exercises.

whyPayGas.question: Why do I have to pay gas?
whyPayGas.answer: You own your data in your own database on Tableland. You can use this data in other dapps, and we believe this is the future of how education will work.

isThisNew.question: Is this new?
isThisNew.answer: Yes, this is a brand new dapp, so please report bugs.

whereDoesMoneyGo.question: Where does the money go?
whereDoesMoneyGo.answer:
For each $1 song:
• $0.50 is donated to Doctors Without Borders (Médecins Sans Frontières/MSF)
• $0.20 goes to rights holders
• $0.176 goes to us for operating expenses
• $0.124 goes to The MLC for the score of the song

You can verify this in the smart contract (View on Base Scout) - thank you Splits.org! Voice credits cover the expenses we use to pay for the speech-to-text AI and LLM grading service.

moreComingSoon.question: Will you be adding more songs?

justEnglish.question: Just teaching English?
justEnglish.answer: Yes, but a community member will be forking for Spanish soon.

isOpenSource.question: Is this code open source?
isOpenSource.answer: Yes, all of our code is fully open source (AGPLv3) on
